[COLOR orange][B]+Avezy[/B][COLOR gold] Addon Requerido[/COLOR][/COLOR] http://Ignoreme plugin://plugin.video.avezy/ https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Andorth/Hercules/master/imagenes/fanart.jpg https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Andorth/ArenaSports/master/avezy.jpg
[COLOR white][B]Deportes[/B] [COLOR orange] Plexus + Acestream [/COLOR] http://ignorame
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/adrianhn/adryanlist/master/adryan/img/acestream.png https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Andorth/Hercules/master/imagenes/fanart.jpg https://pastebin.com/raw/DpkadhRG$$LSProEncKey=deportes$$
[COLOR white][B]21/01/2018 | 16:15 FUTBOL: LA LIGA - REAL MADRID-DEPORTIVO[/B] [COLOR gold]AV 1[/COLOR] https://images.supersport.com/2017/11/La-Liga.Logo-300.jpg $doregex[select]
select #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Ver:', ['La liga-Previa', 'REAL MADRID-DEPORTIVO']) channels = [ 'plugin://plugin.video.youtube/play/?video_id=0mYmDxpn0ek', 'plugin://program.plexus/?url=acestream://63d893d4db0f0c591436c7a88b6f6fc27e84a5b8&mode=1&name=Hercules+AV1'] return channels[ret]
[COLOR white][B]21/01/2018 | 16:15 FUTBOL: LA LIGA - REAL MADRID-DEPORTIVO[/B] [Youtube] [COLOR lime]Emision en directo.[/COLOR] https://images.supersport.com/2017/11/La-Liga.Logo-300.jpg $doregex[select]
select #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m): import xbmcgui dialog = xbmcgui.Dialog() ret = dialog.select('Ver:', ['Previa Partido','Emision en directo 1 [Youtube]', 'Emision en directo 2[Youtube]']) channels = ['plugin://plugin.video.youtube/play/?video_id=0mYmDxpn0ek','plugin://plugin.video.youtube/play/?video_id=1lrV7UuwtBI','plugin://plugin.video.youtube/play/?video_id=3TmjPCW7Xn4'] return channels[ret]
